    • getSubscriptionByBankCardNumber

      public Optional<Subscription> getSubscriptionByBankCardNumber(String input)
      Returns the subscription that has the same number, or the subscriptions with the same starting numbers if you only write some of them.
      Specified by:
      getSubscriptionByBankCardNumber in interface IService
      Parameters:
      input - String to be searched has to be integer value
      Returns:
      Return an optional in case subscription is not found
